mapper.select: select (select size from size WHERE no = s.size_no) as size, price, (select COUNT(*) from sell ss WHERE size_no = s.size_no AND price = s.price) as count from sell s WHERE size_no in (select no from size WHERE product_no = #{product_no}) GROUP BY size_no, price ORDER BY price;
select price from sell left join `order` on sell.no = `order`.sell_no WHERE size_no = #{size_no} AND `order`.no is null ORDER BY price LIMIT 1
